name: L-phenylalanine,NADPH:oxygen oxidoreductase (N-hydroxylating)
definition: L-Phenylalanine + Oxygen + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] <=> N-Hydroxy-L-phenylalanine + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
comment: the first step of three-step reaction (see R09578, R09579+R09580+R09581)
